text: Hey John, I was wondering if you could give me some advice on financial planning? I'm looking to get my finances in order and thought you'd be the perfect person to ask!
Good morning, John! Are you going to the community BBQ next Saturday? Would love to see you there!
Hi John, I saw you helping out at the school fundraiser last week. Thanks for supporting our community!
Hey neighbor! I heard you're a whiz at financial stuff. I might need to pick your brain sometime soon!
It was great seeing you at the grocery store today. Thanks for helping me with my bags!
